meanings.sent1: My little sister is fussier than usual when she misses her nap.
meanings.sent2: The cat became fussier when it heard loud noises outside.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy old man became even fussier when his favorite TV show was interrupted.
meanings.sent4: The toddler's mood swings made her fussier than a cat in a room full of rocking chairs.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's fussier tone made the students pay closer attention.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive or unnecessary concern or attention to detail
meanings.sent1: She became fussier about her appearance as the party approached.
meanings.sent2: The architect was fussier than usual about the measurements of the building.
meanings.sent3: The chef's fussier attitude in the kitchen led to a perfectly cooked meal.
meanings.sent4: His fussier approach to painting resulted in a masterpiece that captured every detail.
meanings.sent5: The fussier customer demanded to see multiple options before making a decision.
